title: The Finite Temperature Effective Potential for Local Composite Operators
abstract: The method of the effective action for the composite operators $\Phi^2(x)$ and $\Phi^4(x)$ is applied to the termodynamics of the scalar quantum field with $\lambda\Phi^4$ interaction. An expansion of the finite temperature effective potential in powers of $\hbar$ provides successive approximations to the free energy with an effective mass and an effective coupling determined by the gap equations. The numerical results are studied in the space-time of one dimension, when the theory is equivalent to the quantum mechanics of an anharmonic oscillator. The approximations to the free energy show quick convergence to the exact result.
